name: Infinity Mission
description:
Blast your way through an unending hoard of drones and missiles in a never-ending battle! Utilize power-ups, strategy, and an itchy trigger finger to take down as many enemies as you can in this retro shoot-em-up.

Update 1.2: Changed the aspect ratio and a few other appearance items. Shield power-up added! There is a known bug with the shield, so be sure not to trust any but the first one completely :)

Arrow keys move your ship and space bar fires your laser.

Credits:

Art, Design, Programming, Sound: Chris Evans

Music : MoppySound

Keep checking back as I update enemies, weapons, and more!
